name: W A V E F O R M
name_original: W A V E F O R M
description:
Fight for survival against increasing odds in this atmospheric isometric survival shooter as you journey into the unknown.

Instructions: 

  • WASD: move
  • Mouse: Aim
  • Left Mouse: Fire
  • Escape: Pause
